What is the largest production deployment of #Mesos?

-I know it's been bench marked on 50,000 nodes tested on AWS for a large company (either AirBNB, twitter or Netflix) so this might give an indication of what it's intended to grow 

-Probably Twitter where the project was incubated. ~100K physical nodes. They aren't terribly public about this.

posts.message: “As a software developer, you are your own worst enemy. The sooner you realize that, the better off you’ll be.”
posts.caption: blog.codinghorror.com
posts.description: 30 May 2007 The Best Code is No Code At All Rich Skrenta writes that code is our enemy. Code is bad. It rots. It requires periodic maintenance. It has bugs that need to be found.
